nodes.text: The Odominic was a Hutt kajidic that operated on the planet Kaikielius during the time of the Galactic Republic.

In 4225 BBY, the Odominic began sell black-market arms to the various criminal elements of Kaikielius, causing many cities to devolve into police-on-gang warfare. The House Praji manipulated the Odominic into supplying both sides in the conflict and Derrica Praji discovered some datatapes that recorded their agreement. The Galactic Republic sent troops to Kaikielius to restore order and the Odominic were driven from the planet.
